task.title: Renewing a Subscription
task.abstract: Subscriptions are renewed directly from the Sales Order record. Upgraded subscriptions or memberships cannot be renewed.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Subscriptions tab in the eBusiness app and select the Subscription ID to be renewed.

step.info: A new Sales Order is automatically created, along with a new Sales Order Line. The Posting Entity is set to Receipt and the Schedule Type is set to Simple Receipt.

step.cmd: Select Closed from the Status picklist and click Save.
step.info: If the Posting Entity is set to Receipt, payment is required in order to complete the renewal request. Click the Sales Receipt button, enter payment information, and click Pay.
step.stepresult: The Posting Status on the Sales Order record automatically updates to Posted to reflect payment.

taskbody.result: The subscription is renewed and the transaction is journaled into the GL.Renewing a subscription does not create a new subscription unless the item is changed on the Sales Order Line record. This renewal is interpreted as an Upgrade, therefore a new subscription is created with a future start date.
